comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
In revision 931838 I added support for the following system properties:

    org.apache.jackrabbit.maxCacheMemory - max memory used for all caches (in bytes, default 16MB)
    org.apache.jackrabbit.maxMemoryPerCache - max memory used for a single cache (in bytes, default 4MB)
    org.apache.jackrabbit.minMemoryPerCache - min memory used for a single cache (in bytes, default 128kB)
    org.apache.jackrabbit.cacheResizeInterval - cache resize interval (in ms, default 1s)

Merged to the 2.1 branch in revision 931840.

description: The cache settings of the CacheManager class (JCR-619) can be adjusted programmatically (JCR-725), but it would be nice if there was also a way to set them with system properties or ideally as a part of the repository configuration.
